function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Household size may impact the propagation of contagious diseases within the home environment.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within larger households.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and regular disinfection practices within larger households.","Technologies":"Use of smart home technologies for automated disinfection processes.","People":"Members of larger households.","Owner":"Household members and caregivers."},{"Description":"Risk perception and attitudes towards home energy management systems (HEMS) may affect the adoption of disease-containment features in the built environment.","Impact":"Low adoption of disease-containment features in HEMS due to negative risk perceptions and attitudes.","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns highlighting the health benefits of disease-containment features in HEMS.","Technologies":"Integration of disease-containment features in smart home technologies.","People":"Homeowners and residents.","Owner":"Smart home technology companies and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Cybersecurity and technology anxiety may deter the adoption of smart home technologies with disease-containment features.","Impact":"Reluctance to adopt smart home technologies with disease-containment features due to cybersecurity and technology anxiety concerns.","Mitigation":"Enhanced cybersecurity measures and user-friendly technology interfaces to minimize anxiety.","Technologies":"Safe and secure smart home technology systems with user-friendly interfaces.","People":"Homeowners and residents.","Owner":"Smart home technology companies and cybersecurity experts."}]}
